properties.Detail_of_Description: The crane was being used to separate a load of steel beams on an adjacent property when a beam hit the wooden construction fence.  The wooden fence hit the bus stop kiosk, breaking the glass panel. SWO#17511 issued. ECB#34626027x issued to Car-Win Constr
properties.Cause_Equipment: The crane was being used to separate a load of steel beams in an adjacient yard and a beam hit a wooden construction fence which hit a bus stop kiosk breaking the glass.

properties.Initial_Detail_of_Accident: Operator was moving wooden mats and went past high boom kick out causing damage to heel of boom. Bent lacings & Chords
properties.Detail_of_Description: operation of a crane, derrick, or hoisting eqipment in an unsafe manner. Crane operator failed to realize his boom angle, booming past high boom kickout causing bent to chords and lacing on heel of crane.

properties.Initial_Detail_of_Accident: OSHA reported crane toppled over. Crane operator is injuried, taken to the hospital
properties.Cause_Equipment: WHILE CONCERTE PLANKS TUBLAR HYDRALIC BOOM SNAPPED CAUSE LOAD TO FALL 4 FT.  OSHA reported crane toppled over. Crane operator suffered minor injuries.
